scripts.deploy:test-integral:holesky: pnpm prepare:deploy holesky test-integral && pnpm codegen && graph deploy --studio metrom-test-integral-holesky
scripts.deploy:swapsicle:mantle-sepolia: pnpm prepare:deploy mantle-sepolia swapsicle && pnpm codegen && graph build && graph deploy metrom-swapsicle-mantle-sepolia -l 0.0.1 --node https://subgraph-api.mantle.xyz/deploy --ipfs https://subgraph-api.mantle.xyz/ipfs
scripts.deploy:swapsicle:mantle: pnpm prepare:deploy mantle swapsicle && pnpm codegen && graph build && graph deploy metrom-swapsicle-mantle -l 0.0.1 --node https://subgraph-api.mantle.xyz/deploy --ipfs https://subgraph-api.mantle.xyz/ipfs
